name: Responsive Web Design
desciption: In this course you’ll learn the fundamentals of responsive web design, create your own responsive web page that works well on any device – phone, tablet, desktop or anything in between. You’ll start by exploring what makes a site responsive and how some common responsive design patterns work across different devices. From there, you’ll learn how to create your own responsive layout using the viewport tag and CSS media queries. As you proceed, you’ll experiment with major and minor breakpoints, and optimizing text for reading. you’ll learn how to create your own responsive layout using the viewport tag and CSS media queries. As you proceed, you’ll experiment with major and minor breakpoints, and optimizing text for reading.

name: Secrets Of Economics
desciption: This course offers a comprehensive, no-nonsense guide to economics. Topics include the production, distribution and consumption of goods and services as well as economic growth and activity, employment, the market economy, you’ll learn how to create your own responsive layout using the viewport tag and CSS media queries. As you proceed, you’ll experiment with major and minor breakpoints, and optimizing text for reading. inflation, wealth, and income distribution. You will understand the inter-related studies of economics such as microeconomics and macroeconomics. On completing this course you will know the principles involved in economics.  It is suitable for people studying business and economics or anybody with an interest in economics and current affairs.
